name: Transmographic Dimension Shifter

items.alias: Cellular Assembler with Wire Sticking Out

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Dr. Ness (from the Arid Rift quest) has a very nice tool for you after you've built a Ness' Decoy Device for him. The tool will warp you out of whatever place in Arid Rift back to the Unicorn staging area #L "Semi Working Cellular Assembler" "275464" #L "Insulated Nano Wire" "275461" #L "Tube of Flexible Carbon Fiber" "275462" #L "Set-and-Reset Flip-Flop" "275463" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Semi Working Cellular Assembler + Insulated Nano Wire = #L "Cellular Assembler with Wire Sticking Out" "275467" Cellular Assembler with Wire Sticking Out + Tube of Flexible Carbon Fiber = #L "A Highly Sustainable Device" "275466" A Highly Sustainable Device + Set-and-Reset Flip-Flop = #L "Ness' Decoy Device" "275456" In the team alien mission you will have to give Dr. Ness the Ness' Decoy Device in order to finish the mission. But you can talk with him a little longer and he will tell you about this wonderful idea about an enhancement to this device. He will give you a: #L "Algorithm: Replotting Matrix" "288453" #16Combine these: Algorithm: Replotting Matrix + Ness' Decoy Device = #L "Transmographic Dimension Shifter" "288452"
